radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: CT ABD & PELVIS W & W/O CONTRAST, ADDL SECTIONS
radiographic_examinations.findings: Dependent atelectasis is mild.  No focal opacities in the partially imaged lower lungs.  No evidence of pleural or pericardial effusion. An 10-mm hypodense lesion in hepatic segment 8 suggests a cyst. The appendix is dilated up to 15 mm with moderate surrounding fat stranding. No associated fluid collection or evidence of free air. The right kidney shows mild fullness of the renal pelvis. No bowel obstruction.
